title: Makes provision regarding credit needs of local communities
summary: Directs the superintendent of banks to consider a banking institution's origination history for certain reverse mortgage loans to a mortgagor or mortgagors whose income does not exceed 80% of the median income of the county of residence when assessing its performance records in meeting credit needs of local communities.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to assessment of banking institution's record regarding credit needs of local communities
